desc: Take a moment to relax and enjoy the day while you sit on this bench with your LINE FRIENDS. #cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: The Whole LINE FRIENDS x MapleStory Gang
desc: It's a LINE FRIENDS and MapleStory mashup! Hang out with all your best buds from both worlds in this giant chair! #cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Jumbo CONY Chair
desc: It's a huge, plush throne that looks just like CONY! #cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Jumbo BROWN Chair
desc: It's a huge, plush throne that looks just like BROWN! #cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Jumbo CHOCO Chair
desc: It's a huge, plush throne that looks just like CHOCO! #cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Jumbo LEONARD Chair
desc: It's a huge, plush throne that looks just like LEONARD! #cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Crystalline Lavender City
desc: You've entered the dream-like city of glass. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Full of Blessings
desc: Blessings on blessings on blessings. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Roly Piggy
desc: This charming hog loves rolling around Maple World. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Golden Oinker Chair
desc: This cute, golden piggy is ready to romp around Maple World. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Adventure Dining Chair: Four-Course Delight
desc: It's a four-course meal sure to dazzle any foodie lucky enough to enjoy it. \r\nYou can earn EXP periodically if you use this in the Adventure Canteen. \r\n#cRestores 150 HP and 150 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Adventure Performance Chair: Magic Show
desc: A magic show sure to baffle and amuse. \r\nYou can earn Adventure Points periodically if you use this in the Adventure Canteen. \r\n#cRestores 150 HP and 150 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Adventure ID Card Chair
desc: A chair that proves you're an Adventure Island local. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Hilla & Magnus Chair
desc: Shh! Miss Hilla and Mr. Magnus are on a movie date! #cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Bubbly Ruins Explorer
desc: Relive discovering the ancient ruins with Brie and Gooda! \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Spring Blossom Rice Cake Chair
desc: Squishy rice cakes may make for an odd chair, but they DO provide excellent cushioning.\r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.# Designed by the China MapleStory player Muzi.

name: Maple Marching Band Chair
desc: Starting today, you're a member of the band! Finally, you'll have that 8-minute freestyle kazoo solo you've always dreamed of!\r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Wish Fulfillment Letter
desc: It's the epitome of wishful thinking!\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Adventure Dining Chair: Feast
desc: A grand feast. \r\nYou can earn EXP periodically if you use this in the Adventure Canteen. \r\n#cRestores 1,500 HP and 1,500 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Adventure Performance Chair: Concert
desc: A mellow concert. \r\nYou can earn Adventure Points periodically if you use this in the Adventure Canteen. \r\n#cRestores 1,500 HP and 1,500 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Bushmaster Chair
desc: Sit high and proud in this chair as proof that you are the ultimate adventurer, a Bushmaster. \n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Immortal Gorgon Throne
desc: A reminder of your time spent with the deadly gorgons of legend!\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: The Clink
desc: There's no mercy for the prisoner in solitary. #cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Bogged Down Chair
desc: Someone get me outta here! \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Blooming Rose Chair
desc: A beautifully blooming rose that's sure to draw every eye. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: In the Moment Chair
desc: Take in a beautiful sunset as you relax in this chair. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Gloomy Room Chair
desc: Mumble grumble... Mumble grumble... Mutter mumble grumble... \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Decadent Desserts Chair
desc: It's like a buffet of all the best desserts in Maple World! What a treat! \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Celestial Whale Chair
desc: Ride atop a magnificient whale as you take in the starry night sky. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Sunny Sand Castle Chair
desc: With Yeti's help, you'll be a true sandcastle master! Go on and give it a try! \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Cherry Blossom Celebrations
desc: Enjoy the Cherry Blossom Festival with Hayato and Kanna on this lovely spring day. \n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Guacamole Dinghy
desc: Relax with Pink Bean on a cool, creamy avocado on the water. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Lazy Shark Cafe
desc: Laze about with a couple of sharks in a cute cafe while you catch a bite to eat. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Summertime Meteor Shower
desc: Watch a beautiful meteor shower in the summer night sky! \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Cloud Ship Constellation Chair
desc: Journey across the night sky in a magnificent ship formed from stars. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.# Designed by China MapleStory player xiaoma.

name: Pink Bean Costume Chair
desc: Enjoy the limelight for a while as the ever-popular Pink Bean! \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Watermelon Crusher Chair
desc: Check out what summer life is like with the Commanders. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Teddy Land Fountain
desc: An adorable teddy-themed fountain. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Plum Blossom Window Chair
desc: Enjoy the beauty of moonlight cascading across plum blossom petals. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Between Sky and Sea
desc: Take a little vacation with nothing but the sky and the ocean stretching before you.\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Golden Milky Way Chair
desc: Drift along the Golden Milky Way and contemplate the mysteries of the universe. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Field Grasshopper Chair
desc: I just love being lazy! \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Maple Tree Cat Nap Chair
desc: Lie back and enjoy the warmth of dappled sunlight shining through maple leaves. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 100 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Grow-a-Buncha-Bunch
desc: You've grown so much! \n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Brilliant Cloud Pouf
desc: It might just carry you off to an enchanted land. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Salon de Lachelein
desc: A salon of your own in Lachelein. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Greenhouse Garden with Blair
desc: Enjoy a visit to the Academy's elegant Greenhouse Garden with Blair. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Greenhouse Garden with Blae
desc: Blae lost the game of rock-paper-scissors, so he doesn't get any tea. How will he live without tea?! \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Puppy Palace
desc: Puppy cuddles all around! \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

name: Golden Library Chair
desc: Adventures of every kind lie just beyond those doors. \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

desc: Mr. Oh sells these rare spices at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

name: Crow-feather Hat
